name: Generate AutoGPT Blocks
description: Generates AutoGPT block code files based on agentic mapping and project context.

required.name: block_names
required.description: List of block names to generate.

optional.name: template
optional.description: Template to use for block code generation.

commands.description: Render block code templates with provided parameters.
Write generated block code to the appropriate directory.

post_conditions: Block code files exist and pass schema validation

error_handling.action: Retry file write up to 2 times.
